roleset.name: make illegal
roleset.note: OUTLAW-V NOTES: Frames file for 'outlaw' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from outlaw.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: By 1997, [almost all remaining uses of cancer-causing asbestos]-1 will be outlawed *trace*-1.

example.name: active
example.text: So far, New York, New Jersey, Nebraska, Georgia, Michigan and Minnesota have outlawed Mr. Maynard's device, citing health concerns.
example.arg: New York, New Jersey, Nebraska, Georgia, Michigan and Minnesota
